overview: Short story which describes that each of us has weaknesses, against which our conscience stands. And all of us always or rarely tries to agree with it. This life dilemma is understandable and close to everyone. The film gives an opportunity to viewers to look at yourself from the side and, causing them a smile, maybe, to reconsider their relationship with conscience in something. The film is embodied in the genre of tragicomedy on the verge of farce, will be interesting to the general public as well as to the experienced viewer.
title: Almost Saint Senya
